description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React and ReactDOM libraries, applies CSS styling, imports the main App component, and renders the App component inside the DOM element with id 'root' within a strict mode wrapper.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root to enable concurrent rendering for the specified DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Render React elements into the root container, initiating rendering of the React component tree.
